#  Corporate Governance 

## Corporate Governance

## Overview

The Board of Directors of Ocugen, Inc. sets high standards for the Company's employees, officers and directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the importance of sound corporate governance. It is the duty of the Board of Directors to serve as a prudent fiduciary for shareholders and to oversee the management of the Company's business. To fulfill its responsibilities and to discharge its duty, the Board of Directors follows the procedures and standards that are set forth in these guidelines. These guidelines are subject to modification from time to time as the Board of Directors deems appropriate in the best interests of the Company or as required by applicable laws and regulations.

## Board of Directors

#  Investor FAQs 

## Investor FAQs

  * [Where is Ocugen's corporate headquarters?](#)

Ocugen’s corporate headquarters are located in Malvern, PA. 

  * [Where is the company incorporated?](#)

Ocugen is incorporated in the state of Delaware. 

  * [What is Ocugen’s fiscal year?](#)

Ocugen operates on a fiscal year, with year-end being December 31. 

  * [How is Ocugen stock traded?](#)

Ocugen is traded on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the symbol “OCGN”. 

  * [Who is Ocugen's transfer agent?](#)

Ocugen’s transfer agent is Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (Broadridge). You can find more information about how to contact Broadridge at: [https://www.broadridge.com](https://www.broadridge.com/). 

  * [How do I report a change the address on my shareholder account?](#)

You must send both your old and new addresses to our transfer agent, Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. by U.S. mail. Each stockholder in question must sign the request for an address change. 

  * [How can I replace a lost stock certificate?](#)

Please contact our transfer agent, Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. at (877) 830-4936 or shareholder@broadridge.com. The company can look up your records and make any necessary adjustments. There is generally a fee involved for replacing lost certificates. 

  * [Does Ocugen have a direct stock purchase plan?](#)

Ocugen does not offer a direct stock purchase plan. 

  * [Who is Ocugen's auditor?](#)

PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP 

  * [Who is Ocugen's legal counsel?](#)

Goodwin Procter LLP 

  * [Where can I get the latest corporate news releases?](#)

You can view our recent press releases by visiting the [News](/press-releases) section of our website. If you would like to receive email alerts regarding our press releases, please visit our [email alerts](/email-alerts) page. 

  * [How can I view documents Ocugen has filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC), including Forms 10-K and 10-Q?](#)

Ocugen’s [SEC filings](/sec-filings) can be accessed under “Financials & Filings” in the “Investors” section of our corporate website or <https://www.sec.gov>

  * [Whom should I contact regarding investor inquiries?](#)

Investor inquiries should be emailed to IR@ocugen.com. 




## Sign up to receive email alerts with the latest news from Ocugen
